descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Simple Display Watch Face is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
With a simple design and beautiful colors our latest Watch Face is definitely a first choice. Download now Simple Display Watch Face and enjoy an amazing experience.
How to setup Simple Display Watch Face:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Simple Display Watch Face.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Simple Display Watch Face app settings menu.
Simple Display Watch Face is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Alignment issue! Watch face does not align properly on the moto 360. Please fix this, the pictures look good and it seems like a nice face for a watch but needs to be fixed.
Nice Looks nice but the watch will not line up with the screen I have uninstalled and reinstalled and still no fix
Broken on moto 360 Really wanted to try this face but it is misaligned on the moto 360 with 5.1.1!
It's not even. Can't see numbers 4-8. üëé
Please fix the alignment issue with moto 360 lollipop 5.1.1 and I'll give you 5 stars..I love the design
Alignment Great looking but 1 star as the face is not alligned correctly for the Moto 360.
recentChanges: Updated to support Moto 360 ambidextrous feature.
